content: उपगम् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To go to, approach; attain, reach (<ab>fig.</ab> also.), arrive at, visit; शशिनमुपगतेयं कौमुदी मेघमुक्तं <ls>R. 6. 85</ls>; so दैवादुपगतं तृणं <ls>Pt. 4</ls>; पदमुपगता <ls>Bh. 2. 10</ls>; <ls>Bk. 1. 1</ls>; तदुपगतं <ls>Mu. 5</ls> duly received. {@--2@} To enter into, penetrate; <ls>Śi. 9. 39.</ls> {@--3@} To undergo, suffer; तपो घोरमुपागतं <ls>Rām.</ls> {@--4@} To go to the state of, attain, acquire; तानप्रदायित्वमिवोपगंतुं <ls>Ku. 1. 8</ls>; प्रतिकूलतामुपगते हि विधौ <ls>Śi. 9. 6</ls>; so निद्रावशं, हर्षं, तृप्तिं, शांतिं, विषादं &c. {@--5@} To approach a woman (for sexual intercourse); सुप्तां मत्तां प्रमत्तां वा रहो यत्रोपगच्छति <ls>Ms. 3. 34</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">4. 40.</ls> {@--6@} To come upon, attack. {@--7@} To occur, happen, present itself; कस्यात्यंतं सुखमुपगतं <ls>Me. 109</ls> <ab>v. l.</ab> {@--8@} To undertake, begin. {@--9@} To suffer, share in. {@--10@} To admit, agree to, consent, allow; वेदांतोपगतं फलं <ls>Ms. 2. 160.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To cause to come near or approach.
